# Changes in 2.13.10

- Update hoi4 ironman melter to 1.14
- Fix vic3 save loading throwing errors
- Fix coat of arms renderer being broken
- Fix Xbox Store installations not being recognized on Windows 11

# Changes in 2.13.9

- Fix keyboard shortcuts triggering multiple times
- Update ironman melter to CK3 1.12
- Update ironman melter to Vic3 1.6
- Retire automatic issue report service. There's no longer a button to report an issue automatically.
  So you have to post any issue reports on GitHub or Discord now.
- Improve GUI performance
